com.alfred.server.utils

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alfred.server.utils.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration utility class that handles configuration initialization
    Author:
    Kevin Kanzelmeyer

    • Method Detail

      • loadProperties

        public static void loadProperties(java.lang.String path)
        Method to load properties from the configuration file. Your configuration file should be in {project root}/cfg. The configuration property keys should match the string values in the above server constants. An example and notes can be found in the cfg directory
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the configuration file

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.lang.String path)
        This static method initializes the devices and plugins for Alfred to manage. The devices are expected in JSON format as an array of devices. An example can be found in the cfg directory at the root of the project
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the json configuration file

      • loadDevice

        public static void loadDevice(org.json.JSONObject obj)
        This device loader method creates a StateDevice instance from the input JSON Object and registers the device with the StateDeviceManager
        Parameters:
        obj - JSON representation of a State Device

      • parseDeviceFile

        public static org.json.JSONArray parseDeviceFile(java.lang.String path)
        Utility to parse the JSON device file and convert it to a JSON array
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file containing the JSON array
        Returns:
        A JSON array instance of the content contained in the input path file
